description:
### isPower

The function checks if the given number is a perfect power of some number. It first checks if the number is 1, in which case it returns true, as 1 is a perfect power of any number. It then goes through a loop where it takes the ith root of the number and checks if the result is a whole number. If so, it returns true, as this means that the number is a perfect power of i.

Input: An integer n
Output: A boolean value - true if the number is a perfect power of some number, else false.

Example:

```js isPower(125) // true ```
